dk.itst.oiosaml.sp.service
Class DispatcherServlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          dk.itst.oiosaml.sp.service.DispatcherServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class DispatcherServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

Main servlet for all SAML handling. This servlet simply dispatches to OIOSamlObjects based on the requested url.

Author:
Joakim Recht , Rolf Njor Jensen
